name: You can give comments before changes

tosdr.tldr: Wikipedia has a requirement to give to the community the ability comment on a proposal to change the terms. The proposal is translated in at least three languages if it is a substantial revision. Wikipedia has traditionally been very inclusive in the way they deal with participation from the community.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: ToS;DR

name: Users freely license their contributions

tosdr.tldr: Wikipedia allows you to license the copyright to any text that you submit under: Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License (“CC BY-SA”), and GNU Free Documentation License (“GFDL”) (unversioned, with no invariant sections, front-cover texts, or back-cover texts). Both of these allow your contributions to be used commercially.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Wikipedia Terms of User are translated into 20 languages

tosdr.tldr: Wikipedia provides their Terms of Use in English, asturianu, български, català, česky, Deutsch, español, sumo, français, galego, italiano, 日本語, македонски, Nederlands, polski, português do Brasil, русский, ไทย, and Tiếng Việt. In addition, Wikipedia provides an overview of the Terms of Use and a table of contents which allows you to jump to the sections you care about the most.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Facebook's third party sharing has crossed into the physical world

tosdr.tldr: Facebook has partnered with Datalogix to match Facebook profiles with drug store purchases. This means that Facebook potentially has access to some of your most intimate details (prescriptions, etc.) that they would normally not be able to access.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Your profile is public by default

tosdr.tldr: When you sign up for Facebook, your profile is public by default. You have to adjust your account settings personally in order to limit the amount and kind of information that you want to be publicly available.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Facebook tracks you via the browser you use

tosdr.tldr: Facebook uses cookies to track you using your browser. This means that advertisers and other companies can use that information to post ads based on what you search online, e.g., SUVs.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Wordpress can change their terms without telling you

tosdr.tldr: Wordpress can change their Terms without notifying you. In addition, they feel that viewing the new agreement is the same as accepting it.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Amazon can terminate your account at any time

tosdr.tldr: “Amazon reserves the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, remove or edit content, or cancel orders in its sole discretion.”

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Amazon requires you waive any right to a jury trial or to a class action lawsuit.

tosdr.tldr: Any claim or dispute you might have with Amazon or products sold there will be resolved by binding arbitration, rather than court, unless you qualify for small claims court. You also agree that any dispute you might have will not be conducted as part of a class action lawsuit.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Amazon has a very broad copyright license

tosdr.tldr: The copyright is very broad, with few limitations, which goes beyond the requirements for running the service. For example, it includes the right for Amazon to license your content to other services (“sublicense”).

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: You can cancel your account at any time

tosdr.tldr: You can cancel your account, but in order to do so, you must contact Amazon.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Dropbox can delete your account after 90 days of inactivity

tosdr.tldr: If your Free Account is inactive for 90 days, Dropbox can delete any or all of your files without providing additional notice.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Dropbox has a no refund policy

tosdr.tldr: Premium Accounts are prepaid and non-refundable.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: You can leave at any time

tosdr.tldr: You can delete your account at any time, and Dropbox provides a direct delete link to make it easier to do so.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: You will be notified of any changes to the Terms

tosdr.tldr: You will be notified via the email associated with your Dropbox account, the Dropbox blog, or the Dropbox terms page of any changes to the Terms. This also holds true if Dropbox is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale or all or part of their assets (which includes personal user information).

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Dropbox uses cookies

tosdr.tldr: Dropbox uses cookies to track your use of their Service. However, they do provide an opt-out link.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Dropbox isn't liable if your data is lost or corrupted

tosdr.tldr: Dropbox isn't liable for any loss or corruption of your data.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Dropbox can remove or limit access to something if an intellectual property claim has been made to that something

tosdr.tldr: When a copyright owner, or representative of that owner, makes an intellectual property claim on Dropbox, Dropbox can take action to remove or limit access to said item.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Jurisdiction is in California

tosdr.tldr: Court of law is California.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Your content is deleted quickly upon request

tosdr.tldr: Although Dropbox may retain and use your information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce their agreements, they will try and delete your information quickly upon request. Even so, that process might be delayed, and backed-up version might exist even after deletion.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Your account can be cancelled without notice, but they'll try to avoid it

tosdr.tldr: Dropbox can cancel your account without notice, but in most cases will do their best to let you know in advance, and help you retrieve your data.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: You retain full control of your copyright

tosdr.tldr: Dropbox doesn't claim any ownership of your copyright. The copyright only grants them the limited rights to run their service.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp doesn't collect any personal information besides mobile phone numbers

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp only collects mobile phone numbers to compare with other users in your contacts. This is for the sole purpose to see which of your contacts have WhatsApp in order to list them under Contacts in the WhatsApp application. This process is carried out on the mobile device itself, and isn't transmitted to any WhatsApp servers.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp decides if your content is appropriate

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp deciders what content or Status Submission is appropriate and complies with their terms. They may remove your content or Status Submissions, and/or terminate your account for uploading material that violates their terms without prior notice.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Court of law is California

tosdr.tldr: You agree that WhatsApp Service is based solely in California.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp requires cookies to operate

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp uses both temporary, session cookies (which disappear after you close your browser) and persistent cookies (which do not) to operate its Service.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp can change their Terms at any time, without notice

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp can change their Terms without notifying you, as they expect you to periodically review their Terms. Furthermore, your continued use of their Service means you accept their new Terms.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: You indemnify WhatsApp from any claim related to your content

tosdr.tldr: You agree to defend and indemnify WhatsApp from any claims arising from your use of their Service, violating their Terms, violating any third party right, or any claim that one of your Status Submissions caused damage to a third party.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp may collect and release your personal and non-personal information in certain situations

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp may collect and release your personal and non-personal information when required to do so by law, or in the good-faith belief that doing so will, in their reasonable belief, assist the law when an individual's physical safety is at risk or threatened.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: Any information you disclose on the WhatsApp Service becomes publicly available

tosdr.tldr: Whatever information you decide to publicly disclose on WhatsApp is available to, and may be collected by, other WhatsApp users.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp periodically accesses your contact list

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp periodically accesses your contact list and/or address book on your mobile device to keep track of mobile phone numbers of other WhatsApp users. However, they do not collect names, addresses, or email addresses.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
meta.author: Ian McGowan

name: WhatsApp doesn't use your personal information to advertise

tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp doesn't use your personal information to send commercial or marketing messages without your consent. If they do use your information, you can opt-in or opt-out.

meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.
